summary: This is a Law360 news article from October 14, 2020, reporting that a Second Circuit panel offered measured support for Ghislaine Maxwell's challenge to an order calling for the release of a deposition central to her case. The article mentions Maxwell's role as the former girlfriend of Jeffrey Epstein and her charges related to helping him abuse underage girls.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell

events.title: Second Circuit Panel Hearing on Maxwell's Deposition Seal

Ghislaine Maxwell is charged with helping Jeffrey Epstein abuse underage girls.
